snippet: A group seeking to recall Gov. Rick Snyder announced Thursday that it had ended the effort after Gov. Scott Walker’s victory in Wisconsin’s recall election.
abstract: Group seeking to recall Michigan Gov Rick Snyder announces that it will end its effort following Gov Scott Walker's victory in the Wisconsin recall election.
lead_paragraph: A group seeking to recall Gov. Rick Snyder announced Thursday that it had ended the effort after Gov. Scott Walker’s victory in Wisconsin’s recall election.
